newsitem.title: USA: Commerce registers trust capital securities.
newsitem.headline: Commerce registers trust capital securities.

text.p: Commerce Bancorp Inc said Tuesday it filed a registration statement with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission for a proposed offering of $50 million of trust capital securities by Commerce Capital Trust I, a newly-formed Delaware business trust.
The managing underwriters will be Wheat First Butcher Singer and Janney Montgomery Scott Inc, the company said.

It is anticipated that the company will grant the underwriters an option to purchase up to an additional $7.5 million aggregate liquidation amount of trust capital securities to cover overallotments, if any, it said.
